response:

Despite this, BIPOC individuals have made significant contributions to the field, including pioneering work in the area of weather forecasting. For example, Dr. David J. In terms of educational attainment, BIPOC individuals have faced systemic barriers to accessing and completing higher education, which has historically been dominated by white institutions and faculty.
